channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sean Combs trial update: The jury is deliberating over a complex set of charges
item.description: The hip-hop mogul faces an overlapping set of charges that include sex trafficking and racketeering conspiracy. The jury resumes deliberations on Tues...

item.title: As light pollution increases, West Texas works to protect the world's largest 'dark sky reserve'
item.description: While recent research shows the night sky is getting brighter every year across North America, the Big Bend area in Texas has fended off the light glo...

item.title: Trump plans to visit Florida's new migrant detention center, 'Alligator Alcatraz'
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis said that the facility should be "ready for business" by the time Trump visits on Tuesday — despite the protests of pro-immi...

item.title: Remembering veteran PBS newscaster Bill Moyers
item.description: Moyers, who died June 26, worked as a special assistant to President Lyndon Johnson before becoming an award-winning journalist and PBS host. Original...

item.title: Most Americans feel democracy is theatened, poll shows. And, Mamdani speaks with NPR
item.description: A new poll shows that 76% of Americans believe democracy is facing a serious threat. And, Zohran Mamdani sits down with NPR to discuss his run for NYC...

item.title: Samantha Lorraine takes on iconic role in new "Dora the Explorer" movie
item.description: In "Dora and the Search for Sol Dorado," Samantha Lorraine plays a teenage Dora exploring the Amazon in a new twist on the beloved Nickelodeon series.

item.title: Watch Live: Senate nears final vote on Trump's "big, beautiful bill"
item.description: The Senate is nearing a final vote on President Trump's massive tax cut and spending bill after a marathon series of amendment votes.

item.title: Musk proposes a new political party, Trump suggests DOGE ‘might have to go back and eat Elon’
Guilty plea expected in 2022 murders of four Idaho students
item.description: Relatives of one victim posted on Facebook that the state had failed them by allowing a plea deal.

item.title: Spain and Portugal record hottest June ever as heatwave grips Europe
item.description: A number of European regions recorded their highest temperatures on the final day of June.

item.title: Three killed in Ukrainian drone attack on central Russia
item.description: The attack on a factory in the city of Izhevsk was more than 1,000km (620 miles) from the border.

item.title: Trump tightens US policy on Cuba
item.description: President Trump says a statutory ban on tourism to Cuba will be enforced more strictly.

item.title: Senate grinds to a standstill as Republicans struggle with Trump’s big bill
item.description: The Senate has come to a standstill as Republicans struggle to wrap up work on President Donald Trump’s big bill of tax breaks and spending cuts.

item.title: US Senate Republicans struggle to push Trump's budget bill over finish line
item.description: As it stands, Republicans in the Senate are yet to convince key holdouts to support Trump's One Big Beautiful Bill Act.

item.title: Tesla shares sink as Musk and Trump renew feud over spending bill
item.description: Tesla shares have taken a hit as the world's richest person and President Trump continue to exchange jabs over the spending bill.
